name: email-sender

api_list.name: Send Email
api_list.description: Simplify your email sending process with our Email Sending API. Say goodbye to manual email sending and let our API handle it for you.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-sender2.p.rapidapi.com/prod/send-mail"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-sender2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://email-sender2.p.rapidapi.com/prod/send-mail"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-sender2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
